content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Coal storage at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of a chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)

### Iron ore storage at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)
Consists of a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=unknown)
Consists of a lab with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5) and a chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position(x=0.5, y=3.5) and a chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when chest is full
- Empty the chest at the specified position to continue mining or other operations
### Errors when no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt
### Errors when fuel source is full
- Ensure the burner mining drill or other entities have sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when waiting for space in destination
- Ensure the destination chest has sufficient space to receive items
### Errors when waiting for source items
- Ensure the source chest has sufficient items to be picked up by the inserter
